reqs.MD Vokes: Perform all provokes of a kill in melee distance
reqs.Heal Other: Crack healing and usage of Heal Other during cade cepts
reqs.Cade Cept: Cade cept at all required times
reqs.Top Lure: Climb in P1 and provoke Vorago at 36 seconds
reqs.Target Cycle: TC with a strong ability, such as snapshot, gstaff, or swh
reqs.Recenter: Recentering P2 from any location with any walking direction
reqs.Climber: Climb in P1 and provoke Vorago at 33 seconds
reqs.Natty: Natty without lost ticks until TC
reqs.Solo Lure: Solo lure with south BD at 30,6 seconds
reqs.Hammer Climber: Apply SWH on TC and climb without losing ticks using BD corner cut (reach the final platform at 30,6 seconds)
reqs.Advanced Solo Lure: Initial lure must be successful and 27,6 seconds until south BD
reqs.Advanced Hammer Climber: Hammer climb with another ability (Snap Shot, Detonate, Hurricane) and perform an acceleration climb (reach final platform at 28,8 seconds)
reqs.Acceleration Climber: Perform an acceleration climb without losing ticks (reach the final platform at 28,2 seconds)

tiers.name: Trio HM
reqs: Achieve a Trio HM kill on any rotation (1/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Trio HM kill

tiers.name: Duo HM
reqs: Achieve a Duo HM kill on any rotation (1/6)

tiers.name: Solo Vorago
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on any rotation (1/4)

tiers.name: Forever Alone
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on every rotation (4/4)
apps: VOD of a successful Solo Phase 5 on every rotation
